title: Betrayal's Sting
goal: Valerius makes his move, revealing his true allegiance or attempting to seize power within the Conclave.

beats.summary: As they prepare to leave the Heartstone's chamber, urgent magical communication reaches them: turmoil has erupted within the Sanctum.
News confirms their fears: Valerius has openly challenged Elara's leadership, revealing a hidden power base and aligning with a faction of disillusioned Sages.
He has exploited the ongoing crisis and Kaelen's absence to solidify his position, presenting himself as the only one capable of decisive action.
The true scale of Valerius's ambition and treachery becomes chillingly clear, a serpent within the very heart of the Sages.
